mapper.select: SELECT om.order_no, LISTAGG(cast(m.material_name || ot.order_tcount as VARCHAR(100)),'/') within group(order by m.material_no) ORDER_MATERIAL, om.order_method, com.com_name, om.order_payprice FROM order_main OM JOIN company COM ON om.com_no=com.com_no JOIN order_item OI ON om.order_no=oi.order_no JOIN order_topping OT ON oi.order_ino=ot.order_ino JOIN material m ON ot.material_no=m.material_no WHERE om.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} group by om.order_no, om.order_method, com.com_name, om.order_payprice
SELECT d.DELIVERY_NAME, d.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, c.COM_Name FROM DELIVERY d JOIN company c ON c.com_no = d.com_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT ci.issue_no, c.coupon_name, ci.issue_status, ci.issue_cdate || ' ~ ' ||ci.issue_edate possiblePeriod, c.coupon_condition FROM coupon_issue CI JOIN coupon c ON ci.coupon_no = c.coupon_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ci.issue_edate >= SYSDATE

SELECT ci.issue_no, c.coupon_name, ci.issue_status, ci.issue_cdate || ' ~ ' ||ci.issue_edate possiblePeriod FROM coupon_issue CI JOIN coupon c ON ci.coupon_no = c.coupon_no WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CI.issue_edate < SYSDATE
select board_no, board_title, board_answer, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='3' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select board_no, board_title, board_answer, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='0' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select board_no, board_title, board_date, board_type from board where board_type='1' and member_no=#{memberNo} order by board_no
select com_name, lat, lon from company order by com_no
